title: Cycle #37
content:
Details can be verified e.g. on the stacks on chain dashboard: https://stacksonchain.com/dashboards/Friedger-Pool/21

First, the total stacking rewards of 1.05152455 BTC were wrapped to 1.04874993 xbtc rewards including a 0.2% wrapping fee by wrapped.com:

https://explorer.stacks.co/txid/0xd733546ba4aed7ce46ad70a9b6fdfe1043391bcf9ea943fee155c8f2c7e69c71?chain=mainnet

Second, the 1.04875000 xBTC rewards were swapped to 53,536.106783 STX on alex go. That is a rate of 1959 sats/stx:

https://explorer.stacks.co/txid/0x0147c5515c0c13a8dba086aa39f66f92163a8b0fc64d222a8ad90737f41203ec?chain=mainnet

17 members received rewards in xBTC (total of 0.00580174 xBTC), 1530 members received rewards in STX (total of 53,239.942129 STX).
